## CypherEditorProps.autocompleteTriggerStrings property

The keys that when typed will automatically open the autocomplete menu

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
autocompleteTriggerStrings?: string[];
```

\[".",":","\[\]","()","<!-- -->{<!-- -->}<!-- -->","\[","(","<!-- -->{<!-- -->","$"\]
